title: Bug 14236Unable to log info messages during jar packaging
description: Bug 14236Unable to log info messages during jar packaging
OB: Using the 04/18 Integration build, I still can't get an info message into thestatus maintained by JarFileExportOperation. In my JarWriter implementation,the close() method is throwing a CoreException which contains a status whoseseverity is set to IStatus.INFO.However, note that JarFileExportOperation.addToStatus() only accepts ERROR andWARNING (and only when they are being logged respectively which they are for mypackage data).
